name: Pong 3D (Arsia)
description:
Creating for a competition, it was above all an  exercise under UE4 that I just took in hand. No assets, no start package, juste the basic mesh. 

The game remains the basic pong with some bonuses. But be careful : don't to get past the speed! Good luck!

Controls:

Player 1 VS IA

Q  = Left

D = Right

Player1 VS Player 2

Z or Up arrow = Up

S or Down arrow = Down

If you want to see the announcement of the context, it's here (French) : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AOO82DqsIB8
